snippet.title: Morphies Law - Nintendo Switch Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Surprise! Morphies Law is OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch! https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/morphies-law-switch
You can follow us on Twitter for updates: https://twitter.com/MorphiesLaw

In Morphies Law, the robot morphing multiplayer shooter for Nintendo Switch where size matters, with each weapon hit you steal mass, making you grow and your enemy shrink. In this TPS when you land a headshot your enemies head will shrink while yours grows, and if you pull off a bunch of leg shots you can see where your giant legs can take you, whatever part you shoot is the part that will grow. If you take some hits and shrink down, you can use your tiny body to hide in secret passages, ready for an ambush.

You can find out more at http://www.morphieslaw.com/!
